content.text:
# African-American Film Critics Association Awards 2003

The 1st African-American Film Critics Association Awards, honoring the best in filmmaking of 2003, were given on 22 December 2003.
Top 10 films
# The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
# Lost in Translation
# In America
# Dirty Pretty Things
# The Last Samurai
# Finding Nemo
# The Italian Job
# Tupac: Resurrection
# Cidade de Deus (City of God)
# Mystic River
Winners
*Special Achievement Award:
**F. Gary Gray - The Italian Job
References
*[https://web.archive.org/web/20121105100003/http://www.highbeam.com/doc/1G1-112074284.html HighBeam]
